title: NEIKO 01902 Adjustable Helping Hand with Magnifying Glass, Third Hand Solder Aid, Soldering Wire Station Stand with Dual Alligator Clips and a Heavy Base, Beading & Jewelry Making Tools, Solder Holder
description: Helping hand tool with magnifier. Heavy duty cast iron base. 2-1/2-Inch, 2X magnifying glass for precision work without eyestrain. Dual alligator spring clamps hold work piece steady.
